summary: This is an email from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Specialist, Maureen Townsel, to the FBI, providing Amazon's response to a law enforcement request regarding Ghislaine Maxwell (External Case No. 2018R01618). The email states that Amazon has redacted titles of expressive materials for privacy and legal reasons and reserves objections due to the voluminous nature of the request and potential undue burden.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the FBI's law enforcement request to Amazon, referenced by external case number 2018R01618.

persons.name: Maureen Townsel
persons.role: Law Enforcement Response Specialist at Amazon.com, Inc.
persons.context: The Amazon employee who sent the email response to the FBI regarding the law enforcement request for information related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Amazon's response to FBI request regarding Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Amazon sends a response to the FBI regarding a law enforcement request for information related to Ghislaine Maxwell, noting redactions and objections.

keyFacts: The FBI submitted a law enforcement request to Amazon regarding Ghislaine Maxwell (External Case No. 2018R01618).
Amazon responded on February 1, 2020, redacting titles of expressive materials for privacy and legal reasons.
Amazon objected to the request as unusually voluminous and potentially causing an undue burden.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative efforts into Ghislaine Maxwell's activities as of early 2020.
